name: Project Giant Robot
description:
Project Giant Robot is an arcade-fighting game developed by Nintendo.
You can play Project Giant Robot on Wii U.
It was produced by Atsushi Inaba, Shigeru Miyamoto and Tadashi Sugiyama. It was directed by Yugo Hayashi and Yusuke Hashimoto. Hiroshi Yamaguchi, Hitomi Kurokawa, Keiki Kobayashi and Naofumi Harada scored the game.
